title: The Wiggles movie
other_title: The Wiggles magical adventure: a Wiggly movie
creator_contributor_role: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Parties
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Parties
description: The Wiggles- Murray, Jeff, Anthony and Greg are planning a surprise birthday party for their friend Dorothy the Dinosaur. There is a big problem however, their guest of honor has gone missing, she's in pursuit of a magician who has stolen Greg's wand, and is upset to think her friends have forgotten her birthday. The Wiggles begin a pursuit of their own when they try to locate Dorothy in time for her party, having a wiggling good time along the way. This is The Wiggles first feature length film and includes 7 new songs. Cast also includes Tony Harvey, Leeanne Ashley, Carolyn Ferrie, Paul Paddick, John Field and Joanne Samuel. Also available on DVD [318899]
